scripts.build: tailwindcss build css/agencia.css -o build/css/agencia.css && tailwindcss build css/contacto.css -o build/css/contacto.css && tailwindcss build css/home.css -o build/css/home.css && tailwindcss build css/portfolio.css -o build/css/portfolio.css && tailwindcss build css/servicios.css -o build/css/servicios.css
